description:
Kululu suddenly quits the platoon and somehow starts working for Momoka`s father, which is only the beginning of his meteoric rise. Later, when Pururu goes undercover at Natsumi`s sleepover, she seems to inadvertently reveal that she`s in love with one of Keroro`s old friends, which drives Sarge crazy...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kururu, I Quit / Pururu, Nurse In Love
クルル やめます / プルル 恋する看護兵
